org.s1.weboperation

Class WebOperation<I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.s1.weboperation.WebOperation<I,O>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapWebOperation, SOAPOperation

    public abstract class WebOperation<I,O>
extends Object
    Base class for some web actions
